overview: B'z LIVE-GYM Pleasure 2008 -GLORY DAYS- is a home video by B'z, released on February 25, 2009 on DVD and December 22, 2010 on Blu-ray. The release covered the band's 20th anniversary tour B'z LIVE-GYM Pleasure 2008 -GLORY DAYS- that concluded exactly twenty years to the day of their debut at Japan's largest concert venue, Nissan Stadium.
title: B'z LIVE-GYM Pleasure 2008 -GLORY DAYS-
